DND5EH.GridTemplateScaling_hint: Lines and cones will have their length scaled. Circles will be converted to an equivalent area rectangle. This seeks to match 5e grid distance when diagonal measurements are involved in template placement.
DND5EH.LoSOnTarget_hint: Enables or disables this feature globally (includes tile cover config option).
DND5EH.LoS_cornererror1: Could not convert visible corners to cover level!
DND5EH.LoS_cornererror2: Could not convert cover level to a string! (Cover level {coverLevel}).
DND5EH.LoS_coverlevelerror1: Cannot create a chat message from unfinalized cover data!
DND5EH.LoS_notargeterror: No target token selected to compute cover for!
DND5EH.LoSMaskNPCs_sourceMask: Another creature is in the way.
DND5EH.LoSCover_hint: [EN] Allow application of cover bonuses. These are applied to the attacker, not the target. These only affect ranged weapon attacks, not dexterity saves
DND5EH.LoSWithTokens_name: Consider intervening tokens as half cover
DND5EH.LoSWithTokens_hint: Unchecked results in tokens not being considered for cover calculation.
DND5EH.LoSMaskNPCs_name: Hide GM info from Cover Report
DND5EH.LoSMaskNPCs_hint: Replaces uses of the NPC's name with "A creature" when reporting cover and whispers GM prompted cover checks.
DND5EH.WildMagicOptions_hint: Enables or disables auto detection of Wild Magic and how it should be handled. Standard (PHB): as seen on PHB pg. 103. More: surges on d20 <= spell level and recharges Tides of Chaos. Volatile: Similar to More, but adds 1d4 to the spell level if Tides of Chaos has been expended.
DND5EH.WildMagicConsoleVolatileSurgeLog: DnD5e Helper: Volatile Surge - {d20result} vs {spellLevel + d4result}(Spell: {spellLevel})(d4: {d4result})
DND5EH.WildMagicConsoleSurgesMessage: {action} as a level {spellLevel} {extraText} spell is cast! {resultText}
DND5EH.WildMagicChatSurgesMessage: A level {lvl} slot was expended({bWasCast}) by a user with the Wild Magic Feature({wmFeatureName})
DND5EH.WildMagicFeatureName_hint: Name of feature that represents the Sorcerer's Wild Magic Surge (default: Wild Magic Surge)
DND5EH.WildMagicTableName_hint: Name of table that should be rolled on if a surge occurs (default: Wild-Magic-Surge-Table). Leave empty to skip this step.
DND5EH.WildMagicTableError: Dnd5e Helper: No Wild Surge table setup
DND5EH.WildMagicTidesOfChaos_hint: Name of feature that represents the Sorcerer's Tides of Chaos (default: Tides of Chaos)
DND5EH.WildMagicTidesOfChaos_error: Dnd5e Helper: Tides of Chaos feature name not setup
DND5EH.WildMagicWisper_hint: Whispers all rolls and table results to the GM
DND5EH.CombatReactionEnable_hint: Enables or disables this feature (global). Apply checks for any abilities and will update a token UI element  to indicate avaliable actions. These will be reset at the start of an actors turn
DND5EH.CombatReactionStatus_actoritemerr: Dnd5e helpers: Not an actors item roll
DND5EH.CombatReactionStatus_effecterror: dnd5e-helpers: could not located active effect named: {reactionStatus}
DND5EH.CombatReactionStatus_combaterror: Dnd5e helpers: Could not find an active combat
DND5EH.CombatLegendary_name: Start of turn legendary action reset.
DND5EH.CombatAbilityRecharge_name: Automatically roll any uncharged abilities with a d6 recharge.
DND5EH.CombatAbilityRecharge_hint: Enables or disables this feature (global). Can be toggled between start or end of turn
DND5EH.CombatAbilityRechargeHide_name: Hide the results of ability recharge rolls
DND5EH.CombatAbilityRechargeHide_hint: Enables or disables this feature (global). Can be toggled between start or end of turn
DND5EH.AutoProf_hint: Checks newly added items and labels as proficient if needed
DND5EH.AutoProf_consolelogfail: {name} could not be matched to proficiency , please adjust manually
DND5EH.AutoRegen_hint: Automaticly prompts for regeneration rolls for the GM
DND5EH.UndeadFort_hint: Automaticly prompts for Undead Fortitude Checks for the GM
DND5EH.LairHelper_hint: Prompts GM for lair actions at initiative count 20, draws from active combatants
DND5EH.GreatWoundEnable_hint: Rolls on a specified table when a token takes over 50% max hp in a single blow,
DND5EH.GreatWoundDialogError: Looks like you haven't setup a table to use for {gwFeatureName} yet
DND5EH.GreatWoundFeatureName_hint: What name to display for Great Wound functions
DND5EH.GreatWoundTableName_hint: Name of table that should be rolled on if a Great Wound occurs.
DND5EH.OpenWoundFeaturename_hint: What name to display for Open Wound functions.
DND5EH.OpenWoundDeathSave_hint: Open Wounds triggered on death saves failed by 5 or more
DND5EH.OpenWoundDeathSave_reason: from a failed death saving throw
DND5EH.OpenWoundCrit_hint: Open Wounds triggered on attack rolls. If an attack roll is greater than this value an Open Wound is rolled. To disable this leave the field blank
DND5EH.OpenWound0HP_hint: Open Wounds triggered on dropping to 0 HP
DND5EH.OpenWound0HPGW_name: Open Wound - HP at 0 from a Great Wound
DND5EH.OpenWound0HPGW_hint: Open Wounds triggered on dropping to 0 HP from a damage source dealing over half the actors max HP (requires Great Wounds active)
DND5EH.OpenWoundTableName_hint: Name of table that should be rolled on if a Open Wound occurs.
DND5EH.OpenWoundTableName_error: Looks like you haven't setup a table to use for {owFeatureName} yet
DND5EH.OpenWoundDebug_hint: Adds a few console logs for debugging purposes
DND5EH.Hooks_preUpdateActor_updatelog: Dnd5e Helpers: {actorName}'s update contains hp: {hp}, spells: {spells}
DND5EH.Hooks_preupdateToken_updatelog: Dnd5e Helpers: {ActorName}'s update contains hp: {hp}, and Fort: {fortSett}
